text: Wilbur Wright College, also known as Wright Junior College, is a public community college in Chicago. It is part of the City Colleges of Chicago system. It offers two-year associate's degrees. They also offer training in IT, manufacturing, medical, cyber tech, and business fields. Its main campus is located on Chicago's Northwest Side in the Dunning neighborhood. ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Chicago
title: Wilbur Wright College
